meta.name: description
meta.content: Fayette County Schools serves grades PK-12 and is located in Somerville, TN.

div.span: **Vision Statement: Every Student; Every Day**Mission Statement: To inspire every student to reach their full potential.**Statement of Goals: Focus on every student. Invest in our staff. Partner with our community.**

article.div: Shirts can be collared shirt or t-shirt in: Light Blue, Light Pink, Charcoal Gray, Royal Blue, or White! #Unity

h1.a: FAYETTE COUNTY PUBLIC SCHOOLS ONLINE REGISTRATION INFORMATION

div.div: Fayette County Public Schools does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, sex, disability, genetics or age.
